DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether topical application PEP005 safe treatment actinic keratoses .
DOC.brief_title: Study Determine Safety Two Applications PEP005 Topical Gel Actinic Keratoses
DOC.criteria: Male female patient At least five individual AK lesion arm , shoulder , chest , face and/or scalp A cosmetic therapeutic procedure : within 10 cm select AK lesion 3 month prior study entry anywhere 4 week prior study entry anticipate treatment study Treatment 5fluorouracil , imiquimod , diclofenac photodynamic therapy : lesion locate within 10 cm select AK lesion 3 month prior study entry anywhere 4 week prior study entry anticipate treatment study Use acidcontaining product , topical retinoids light chemical peel within 10 cm select AK lesion 3 month prior study entry , anticipate treatment area study Treatment immunomodulators , cytotoxic drug , interferon/interferon inducer 4 week prior study entry anticipate treatment study Treatment psoralen plus UVA use UVB therapy 6 month prior study entry anticipate treatment study Use systemic retinoids 6 month prior study entry anticipate treatment study Anticipated excessive prolong exposure ultraviolet light use topical salve , cream ointment select AK lesion study Females childbearing potential
